select t3.name as studentName,t3.id as studentId,t4.id as courseId ,t4.name as courseName, t1.create_time as createTime,t1.* from t_product as t1,t_student_course as t2,t_student as t3,t_course as t4 where t1.student_course_id = t2.id and t2.course_id = t4.id and t2.student_id = t3.id
AND t2.`student_Id` =#{studentId}
